summary: REQ-25 and most of REQ-26 appear implemented: backend exposes a non-throwing `isAvailable()` query, and the frontend performs availability checks on the Title screen with polling, UI warning, disabled launch buttons, and a retry action. REQ-27 is only partially evidenced due to doc truncation; explicit guidance for funding with cycles and troubleshooting steps are not clearly present in the shown diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Operations document includes explicit guidance for keeping the canister running (started, funded with cycles) and what to check when users see 'server offline/stopped' errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The added ops doc clearly states the uptime limitation and controller responsibility, and starts a section about ensuring the canister is started, but the provided diff is truncated before any concrete steps/commands and does not show guidance about cycles funding or a troubleshooting checklist.

missing_requirements.requirement: Preflight check immediately before invoking both New Game and Continue.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a preflight check in `handleNewGame`, but the `handleContinue` implementation is not visible in the truncated `App.tsx` excerpt, so it cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added extensive launch diagnostics tracking (startupComplete, launchStage, gameMounted, etc.) and related launch-error navigation beyond a simple availability preflight/UI warning.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-26 requests a preflight availability check and clear offline UI on the Title screen; the additional diagnostics state machinery is not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced launch error normalization utility usage (`normalizeLaunchError`) not mentioned in requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for error normalization; it only requires English UI messaging when the server is offline/stopped.
